episode of.title: D.A.T. Life Decisions After Temptation (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The saga continues; Vulcan City is in an uproar as the past is closing in on everyone. Motor City invades Vulcan City with a Vengance.The ladies of the Satellite Room come face to face with their demons. Redemption comes with a price. Who is willing to pay? Who will lose their life just to save another?

locations: 29 Degrees East Point, Georgia, USA::(The Gentlemens Club)
imdb.plot outline: How does one decision change the course of life for these ten people? What if what you thought was the truth of your very own life in now in question; based off a weekend of lies? D.A.T. Life the Series will tackle the lives of these 10 people who live in Vulcan City. Vulcan City has many secrets, big businesses, lavish clubs, and immaculate homes. Though what is truly going on within Vulcan City?
imdb.title: D.A.T. Life Decisions After Temptation
akas: D.A.T. Life Decisions After Temptation (United States)
plot: How does one decision change the course of life for these ten people? What goes on in Vulcan City that keeps these ladies on edge? What has temptation done to you? How far would you go to keep your deep dark secrets hidden?::Bená Klier

How does one decision change the course of life for these ten people? What if what you thought was the truth of your very own life in now in question; based off a weekend of lies? D.A.T. Life the Series will tackle the lives of these 10 people who live in Vulcan City. Vulcan City has many secrets, big businesses, lavish clubs, and immaculate homes. Though what is truly going on within Vulcan City?::Bena Klier
synopsis: Backstage of The Satellite Gentlemen Club, the dancers dressing room Divinity and Temptation are engaged in conversation as other dancers are getting ready to hit the club floor. Madam X (Chanta Willis) and JazMine (Carla Shinal) are talking about Divinity (Yasmia Taylor) and Temptation (Brittney Lasha Brown). Its a busy Friday night, money drinks and drugs flowing all anticipating making a lot of money.Temptation and Divinity are sitting next to one another at the makeup station putting on their stage makeup, Madam X and JazMine are behind them glancing over their shoulder listening to Temptation and Divinity conversation. Temptation begins to dance again for Billy (Eric Abraham) the dance is more intense being that she has revealed her name and has to look directly at him, she feels uncomfortable yet as with any dance she must play it off in order to keep the money flowing. She tries to look at him yet starts feeling very uneasy, dirty, (Flashback of when she was raped) she gets distracted when she sees Divinity approaching.Inside are three white women these three are known as the snow bunnies, not only are they white they come dressed in all white attire. Madam X is standing and watching Temptation and the Snow Bunnies, she decides that she also wants some of that money, she also notices how SB4 leaves the group and goes to bar area Madam X walks over, approaches Snow Bunny #4 (Stacie Ballard) laughing and up comes Temptation looking mean at Madam X.Next day Divinity is laying on the couch in her home. She is reflecting on the night before with Madam X calling her a gutter rat,thinking of her childhood and how her mother would leave her alone in house with no food, dirty clothes and beating her daily, she is startled by the phone ringing.Peter/Paul (William Curtis Coppersmith) is mad at himself for losing 10k on a poker game the night before, he hasnt slept in days. The phone rings and it's some Detective from Motor City. He is paranoid and fights with Paul who is himself. Peter transitions into Paul his protector.Billy and Peter walk into the club towards the bar, Peter leans his back onto the bar and Billy is facing him at the bar to order a drink when Peter glances over and notices Stacey coming out of the womens restroom, he bursts out laughing and Billy turns to see what Peter is laughing at when Stacey bumps into Billy. They lock eyes.Back at the office with Samantha (Shelley Alexander) digging around on Abby (Lisa Searcy) desk, she opens desk drawers and discovers a gun laying inside, with Samantha's back turned Larry approaches and startles Samantha, she turns in surprise. Oh Larry (Michael Bullard) you scared me. Larry wait what are you doing, no Larry stop please!
